METADATI.TITLE: Metadata
METADATI.DESCRIPTION: This section lists the main components that make up each station. For each station, information is provided such as the type of installed unit, identifying codes (Acronet code, pole number, SIM serial number, IMEI), and associated devices (e.g., solar panel, data acquisition board). The data is used for identifying, configuring, and monitoring stations in the field.

GALLERIA.TITLE: Gallery
GALLERIA.DESCRIPTION: This section collects representative images of the stations and their components. The photos show field installations, technical device details (such as Acrostation, Acroboard, solar panels, sensors, etc.), and typical configurations. The gallery provides visual support useful for recognizing, documenting, and better understanding the composition of the stations.
GALLERIA.MSG_ERROR: No images were found for this station.

QRCODE.TITLE: QR Code
QRCODE.DESCRIPTION: This section provides a QR code for each station. The QR code is a two-dimensional barcode that can be scanned with a smartphone or tablet. By scanning the code, users can quickly access information related to the station, such as its location, monitoring data, and other relevant information.

PREFERENCE.TITLE: Preferences
PREFERENCE.DESCRIPTION:
This section allows customization of user preferences for the application. 
Users can modify settings related to data visualization. 
Saved preferences are applied to all stations monitored by the user.

OPZIONI.MSG_DOWNLOAD: Please wait while the selected sensor data is loaded for the specified period.

DOWNLOAD.TITLE: Download
DOWNLOAD.DESCRIPTION:
This section allows downloading station data. 
Users can select the desired time period to export data. 
This feature is useful for analyzing data offline or sharing it with others.

THRESHOLD.TITLE: Thresholds
THRESHOLD.DESCRIPTION: This section allows setting thresholds for station data. Users can define limit values for various parameters (e.g., temperature, humidity, etc.) and receive notifications when data exceeds those thresholds. This feature is useful for monitoring environmental conditions and making informed decisions.

RESE_ADV.TITLE: Advanced Search
RESE_ADV.DESCRIPTION: This section allows advanced searches among stations. Users can filter results based on various criteria such as geographic location, station type, monitored parameters, and more. This feature helps quickly find stations that meet specific monitoring needs.
